title: ICE when building (invalid syntax)

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I tried to compile project:

I have `rustc 1.9.0-dev (998a6720b 2016-03-07)`

```
$ git clone https://github.com/hfiguiere/foxbox.git
$ cd foxbox ; git checkout rustc-ice-2
$ cargo test
```

I get an internal compiler error.

```
   Compiling foxbox v0.1.0 (file:///home/hub/source/mozilla/foxbox)
error: internal compiler error: Error constructed but not emitted
error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.
note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#bug-reports
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'explicit panic', src/libsyntax/errors/mod.rs:360
stack backtrace:
   1:     0x7f9c49abbfd0 - sys::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::h0521077ef22e0136cHv

                        at /home/hub/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/stainless-0.1.4/src/parse.rs:109

                        at /home/hub/.cargo/registry/src/github.com-88ac128001ac3a9a/stainless-0.1.4/src/describe.rs:62

Could not compile `foxbox`.

```

This is the commit causing it:
https://github.com/hfiguiere/foxbox/commit/c7e0443e8c7886843bde17f42f6c128cdcdea47a
